name: The Adventure of a Ninja
description:
Story:

"The Adventure of a Ninja" is a 2D pixel platformer where you play as a Ninja. You fell into an alien's portal and in order to go back, you have to fight your way to the alien and defeat it. in this adventure, you will encounter lots of powerful monsters, as well as "parkour" sections with spikes. 

Credits:

SketchyLogic

bart

Additional Info:

Made by Stergios Kokkinis. This is my very first game so you may find it a bit glitchy. Do leave a comment giving feedback or just saying if you liked it or not.Hope you enjoy!
